divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside at my home talking on the phone to a friend describing a previous sighting when I saw a bright orange light hovering about 35 to 40 degrees off the ground. I didn't know what it was, I knew it wasn't a plane, helicopter, or street light. It was to high to be street light, there was no sound or blinking lights. It just hovered with no sound. I was curious about it and kind of excited that I had seen two UFOs in one night. I lost sight of it when i went inside to eat before my food got cold. The weather was clear. The object didn't move, make sounds, or have any blinking lights. When I went outside an hour later it was gone.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Benson
There was one other sighting in Benson on or around July 12th 2007
